pullRequest.body:
Rework of properties about iSup/iInf/limsup/liminf and addition in extended reals:

- A key property about addition and order has been abstracted away in Data.Real.Ereal. Three new lemmas `add_le_of_forall_lt_add_top`, `add_le_of_forall_lt_add`, `le_add_of_forall_gt_add`. The first one is private (generalized by the second one).
- These new lemmas allow for _very_ streamlined proofs of `add_liminf_le_liminf_add` and `limsup_add_le_add_limsup` in Topology.instances.EReal. I've also deleted a few intermediate lemmas which are not needed anymore.
- These new lemmas also allow for short proofs of a few more useful lemmas: `add_iInf_le_iInf_add`, `iSup_add_le_add_iSup` about Inf/Sup, and `limsup_add_liminf_le_limsup_add`, `liminf_add_le_limsup_add_liminf` about limsup/liminf.

---

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message

- ...

Coming here from PR triage: it looks like this PR is waiting for review - except that is has a merge conflict, so will not appear in the review queue. Can you merge master, please? Thanks!
Hi @grunweg, just merged master. Thank you for your feedback.

LGTM now. In case someone wants to quibble about lemma names (some of these seemed pretty hard to name well):

maintainer merge
🚀 Pull request has been placed on the maintainer queue by j-loreaux.

bors r+
Thanks!

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10619332002/job/29436663252)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10619332002/job/29436663847)
This is all I have time for, but even with these changes, I think it's close to ready for merging.
@D-Thomine Golfed a bit.
I'm a fan of this abstraction, but I think we can get away with even better proofs.
This is all I have time for, but even with these changes, I think it's close to ready for merging.

This and the next lemma should follow much more easily from properties about `WithTop` and `WithBot`. Can you try to reprove them in a simpler way using those instead? If you can't manage it, ping me and I'll give it a go.

@j-loreaux : thanks for the idea. Here is what I've done:

- new lemmas `le_forall_gt_iff_le_of_withBot`, `ge_forall_lt_iff_ge_of_withBot`,  `le_forall_gt_iff_le_of_withTop`, `ge_forall_lt_iff_ge_of_withTop` in Order.WithBot. The idea is to push the lemmas `le_of_forall_le_of_dense`, `ge_of_forall_le_of_dense` through WithBot/WithTop constructions.
- the versions for EReal `le_forall_real_gt_iff_le`, `ge_forall_real_lt_iff_ge` can be deduced from `le_forall_gt_iff_le_of_withBot` pretty easily (I actually don't need the three other versions of the latter). This is not completely trivial (EReal is _WithBot (WithTop R)_, so `le_forall_gt_iff_le_of_withBot` gets you a version with _WithTop R_ instead of _R_), but still much cleaner than the current state of things.

Does this looks good to you?

There are two specific points on which I'd like your feedback:

- I am still quite bad at naming lemmas. I don't really like this version (for instance `le_forall_gt_iff_le_of_withBot`), so any suggestion is welcome.
- the proof of `ge_forall_real_lt_iff_ge` is too cumbersome. It should be a one-liner using `le_forall_real_gt_iff_le` and the negation (as an order-reversing isomorphism), but I don't know how to write it.

```suggestion
lemma add_le_of_forall_add_le {a b c : EReal} (h : ∀ d < a, ∀ e < b, d + e ≤ c) : a + b ≤ c := by
```

```suggestion
lemma le_add_of_forall_le_add {a b c : EReal} (h₁ : a ≠ ⊥ ∨ b ≠ ⊤) (h₂ : a ≠ ⊤ ∨ b ≠ ⊥)
```

I think I would be tempted to factor out this lemma in order to simplify the proofs a bit. Also, I've renamed your lemma a bit. (obviously all still in the `WithBot` namespace.)
```lean
lemma forall_le_iff_eq_bot [Preorder α] [NoMinOrder α] {x : WithBot α} :
    (∀ y : α, x ≤ y) ↔ x = ⊥ := by
  refine ⟨fun h ↦ forall_lt_iff_eq_bot.mp fun y ↦ ?_, by rintro rfl y; exact bot_le⟩
  obtain ⟨w, hw⟩ := exists_lt y
  exact (h w).trans_lt <| by exact_mod_cast hw

-- it's `WithTop` counterpart
lemma _root_.WithTop.forall_ge_iff_eq_top [Preorder α] [NoMaxOrder α] {x : WithTop α} :
    (∀ y : α, y ≤ x) ↔ x = ⊤ :=
  WithBot.forall_le_iff_eq_bot (α := αᵒᵈ)

lemma le_of_forall_lt_iff_le [LinearOrder α] [DenselyOrdered α] [NoMinOrder α]
    {x y : WithBot α} : (∀ z : α, x < z → y ≤ z) ↔ y ≤ x := by
  refine ⟨fun h ↦ ?_, fun h z x_z ↦ le_trans h (le_of_lt x_z)⟩
  induction x with 
  | bot => exact le_of_eq <| forall_le_iff_eq_bot.mp fun z ↦ h z (bot_lt_coe _)
  | coe x =>
    rw [le_coe_iff]
    rintro y rfl
    exact le_of_forall_le_of_dense <| by exact_mod_cast h

lemma ge_of_forall_gt_iff_le [LinearOrder α] [DenselyOrdered α] [NoMinOrder α]
    {x y : WithBot α} : (∀ z : α, z < x → z ≤ y) ↔ x ≤ y := by
  refine ⟨?_, fun h z x_z ↦ le_trans (le_of_lt x_z) h⟩
  induction y with
  | bot => simpa using forall_le_iff_eq_bot.mp
  | coe y =>
    rw [le_coe_iff]
    rintro h x rfl
    exact le_of_forall_ge_of_dense (by exact_mod_cast h)
```

Done, thank you very much!

(there are a couple of tweaks in the files -- `_root_.WithTop.forall_ge_iff_eq_top` is directly in the `WithTop` namespace, and I used `ge_of_forall_gt_iff_ge` instead of `ge_of_forall_gt_iff_le` -- more symmetric, and somewhat natural if we focus on `y`).
I've also taken this opportunity to clean up the proof of `EReal.limsup_le_iff` with a few tricks I've learnt this summer.

These should be named the same, except they are in the `WithTop` namespace. So this one is:
```suggestion
lemma le_of_forall_lt_iff_le [LinearOrder α] [DenselyOrdered α] [NoMaxOrder α]
    {x y : WithTop α} : (∀ z : α, x < z → y ≤ z) ↔ y ≤ x :=
  WithBot.ge_forall_lt_iff_ge_of_withBot (α := αᵒᵈ)
```

Likewise:
```suggestion
lemma ge_of_forall_gt_iff_le [LinearOrder α] [DenselyOrdered α] [NoMaxOrder α]
    {x y : WithTop α} : (∀ z : α, z < x → z ≤ y) ↔ x ≤ y :=
  WithBot.le_forall_gt_iff_le_of_withBot (α := αᵒᵈ)
```

```suggestion
  aesop
```
Done, thanks.

```suggestion
  refine ⟨fun h ↦ WithBot.ge_forall_lt_iff_ge_of_withBot.1 ?_,
    fun h z x_z ↦ le_trans (le_of_lt x_z) h⟩
  rw [WithTop.forall]
  aesop
```

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(EReal): rework limsup_add properties
